# core.expressions.Variable { #optyx.core.expressions.Variable }

```python
core.expressions.Variable(name, lb=None, ub=None, domain='continuous')
```

A decision variable in an optimization problem.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                   | Description                                           | Default        |
|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|----------------|
| name   | [str](`str`)                                                           | Unique identifier for this variable.                  | _required_     |
| lb     | [float](`float`) \| None                                               | Lower bound (None for unbounded).                     | `None`         |
| ub     | [float](`float`) \| None                                               | Upper bound (None for unbounded).                     | `None`         |
| domain | [Literal](`typing.Literal`)\[\'continuous\', \'integer\', \'binary\'\] | Variable type - 'continuous', 'integer', or 'binary'. | `'continuous'` |
